titles.title: 盲導犬クイールの一生

data.title: Moudouken Quill no Isshou
data.title_japanese: 盲導犬クイールの一生
data.synopsis: A biographical anime about Quill, a real life guide dog.

data.title: Kokoroya
data.title_japanese: ココロ屋
data.synopsis: An educational film about empathy in Japan. In the movie's example, uses a sci-fi twist to show how the hearts of others to the main character in certain situations.

titles.title: いわたくんちのおばあちゃん

data.title: Iwata Kunchi no Obaachan
data.title_japanese: いわたくんちのおばあちゃん
data.synopsis: An educational film based on a true story of an elementary school boy bringing his wheel-chair bound grandmother to school in order for her to tell the story of her living through WW2 and the atomic bomb.

data.title: Seitokai Yakuindomo* OVA
data.title_japanese: 生徒会役員共＊ OAD
data.synopsis: OVAs of Seitokai Yakuindomo* which were either bundled with the limited editions of the manga volumes or as standalone OVAs.

titles.title: Paper Cranes Story: Kenta to Maiko
Paper Cranes Story ～ケンタとマイコ～

data.title: Paper Cranes Story: Kenta to Maiko
data.title_japanese: Paper Cranes Story ～ケンタとマイコ～
data.synopsis:
Based on the picture eBook of the same name.

One by one, with feeling, the Thousand Paper Cranes are folded.
What if, those paper cranes had a "life" of their own...
The purpose given to the Thousand Paper Cranes!
The spectacular adventure of Kenta and Maiko begins now!!

(Source: dreamonefilm)

titles.title: Afghanistan Paghman-mura no Monogatari: Sekaiichi Utsukushii Boku no Mura
Afghanistan Paghman Mura no Monogatari: Sekaiichi Utsukushii Boku no Mura
アフガニスタン・パグマン村の物語 せかいいち　うつくしい　ぼくの村

data.title: Afghanistan Paghman-mura no Monogatari: Sekaiichi Utsukushii Boku no Mura
data.title_japanese: アフガニスタン・パグマン村の物語 せかいいち　うつくしい　ぼくの村
title_synonyms: Afghanistan Paghman Mura no Monogatari: Sekaiichi Utsukushii Boku no Mura
data.synopsis: An educational film about Paghman, Afghanistan showing the simple life and beauty of the region and its regular citizens to juxtapose the War in Afghanistan that stared in real life the year prior.

titles.title: Afghanistan Paghman-mura no Monogatari: Boku no Mura ni Circus ga Kita
Afghanistan Paghman Mura no Monogatari: Boku no Mura ni Circus ga Kita
アフガニスタン・パグマン村の物語 ぼくの村にサーカスがきた

data.title: Afghanistan Paghman-mura no Monogatari: Boku no Mura ni Circus ga Kita
data.title_japanese: アフガニスタン・パグマン村の物語 ぼくの村にサーカスがきた
title_synonyms: Afghanistan Paghman Mura no Monogatari: Boku no Mura ni Circus ga Kita
data.synopsis: Following the previous story, a circus comes to town displaced by the War in Afghanistan. This one has a stronger focus on the actual war affecting the citizens.

titles.title: Kie Saranu Kizuato: Hi no Umi Osaka
消えさらぬ傷あと 火の海・大阪

data.title: Kie Saranu Kizuato: Hi no Umi Osaka
data.title_japanese: 消えさらぬ傷あと 火の海・大阪
data.synopsis: An educational film about the bombing of Osaka in 1945.

titles.title: Hato yo: Hiroshima no Sora wo
はとよ　ひろしまの空を

data.title: Hato yo: Hiroshima no Sora wo
data.title_japanese: はとよ　ひろしまの空を
data.synopsis:
Based on a book of the same name. 

An anime about the atomic bombing of Hiroshima. The focus is a middle school boy who kept and bred carrier pigeons. While he was out of the city training them, the bomb dropped. Both he and the pigeon desperately tried to find their mother and child respectively in the chaos.

data.title: Okori Jizou
data.title_japanese: おこりじぞう
data.synopsis:
Based on a book of the same name. 

A stop-motion anime about the atomic bombing of Hiroshima. A 6 year old girl named Hiro-chan gets burned by the bomb while playing with a local laughing Jizo statue. While crying out her mothers name she also begged for water. Suddenly the Jizo statue's face became that of an angry expression and tears started flowing from its eyes which Hiro-chan was able to drink.

titles.title: おかあちゃんごめんね

data.title: Okaachan Gomen ne
data.title_japanese: おかあちゃんごめんね
data.synopsis: A stop-motion anime about the bombing of Osaka based on Hamano Kinuko's experience when she was 6 years old. In which her very weak mother was able to save her and her friends by self-sacrifice.

data.title: Nagasaki no Kouma
data.title_japanese: ながさきの子うま
data.synopsis: A stop-motion anime about the atomic bombing of Nagasaki. The story follows a young boy an 1 surviving foal as they try to survive the wreckage and make their way to the mountains for safety.

titles.title: Tobiuo no Boy wa Byouki desu
トビウオのぼうや は びょうきです

data.title: Tobiuo no Boy wa Byouki desu
data.title_japanese: トビウオのぼうや は びょうきです
data.synopsis:
An anime about Operation Castle and the demise of the crew on the Daigo Fukuryuu Maru (S.S. Lucky Dragon 5). On March 1st 1954, a hydrogen bomb went off (that ended up being similar sized to the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima). The radioactive ash fell on the crew, poisoning them.
The anime deviates into fantasy as the ash also affected the marine life--that talk and wear human clothing and is the main focus of the movie; how the radioactive ash affected the talking fish.

data.title: Shounen H ga Mita Sensou
data.title_japanese: 少年Ｈが見た戦争
data.synopsis: An educational anime about the Pacific War. Based on the autobiographical best selling work by Kappa Senoo.

titles.title: なっちゃんの赤いてぶくろ

data.title: Nat-chan no Akai Tebukuro
data.title_japanese: なっちゃんの赤いてぶくろ
data.synopsis:
Based on a book by Nishino Ayako.

A story about the atomic bomb dropping on Hiroshima. Elementary schooler Nat-chan moved to Hiroshima and was knitting red gloves her male friend Shun-chan. The bomb hits and she dies. Shun-chan now an adult reunites with Nat-chan's remains via her shadow (nuclear shadow that is, where her body vaporized leaving an outline).

data.title: Okaasan no Ki
data.title_japanese: おかあさんの木
data.synopsis:
Based on a book by Okawa Etsuo.

In 1937 a mother with 7 children has to see her eldest three sons go off to war. She plants Paulownia tree seeds and prays to the trees every day for her sons to come back safely.

titles.title: しんちゃんのさんりんしゃ

data.title: Shin-chan no Sanrinsha
data.title_japanese: しんちゃんのさんりんしゃ
data.synopsis: The story about a real life 3 year old boy named Shin-chan burned by the atomic bomb when riding his tricycle. He died later that night and his burnt tricycle is displayed at war museum.

data.title: Shinken Seminar Koukou Kouza
data.title_japanese: 進研ゼミ高校講座
data.synopsis:
Shinken Seminar Koukou Kouza is Benesse's correspondence course that helps middle school students get into their high schools of choice. The story follows a middle school boy named Shouta as he strives to get in the right high school, despite the appearance of a rival.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: がんばれ！ルルロロ　第２シリーズ

data.title: Ganbare! Lulu Lolo 2nd Season
data.title_japanese: がんばれ！ルルロロ　第２シリーズ
data.synopsis:
The anime centers around the daily life of two twin bear sisters: the orange-colored Lulu and the yellow-colored Lolo. The two take on new jobs and, despite the occasional failure and tears, give their best efforts.

(Source: ANN)

data.title: Yuri Kuma Arashi
data.title_japanese: ユリ熊嵐
data.synopsis:
In the past, humanoid bears coexisted with humans. However, a meteor shower that fell onto Earth had a strange effect on bears throughout the world: they suddenly became violent and hungry for human flesh, spurring an endless cycle of bloodshed in which bear ate man and man shot bear, forgetting the lively relationship they once had. The "Wall of Severance" was thus built, separating the two civilizations and keeping peace.

Kureha Tsubaki and Sumika Izumino are two lovers attending Arashigaoka Academy, who, upon the arrival of two bears that have sneaked through the Wall of Severance and infiltrated the academy, find their relationship under a grave threat. The hungering yet affectionate bears, Ginko Yurishiro and Lulu Yurigasaki, seem to see the bear-hating Kureha as more than just another meal, and in getting closer to her, trigger an unraveling of secrets that Kureha may not be able to bear.

When their relationships provoke the Invisible Storm, a group that keeps order within the ideological school, the girls must stand on trial with their love, embarking on a journey of self-discovery en route to attaining true love's "promised kiss."

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Yuri Kuma Arashi was known by several different working names, such as Penguinbear Project and Yuri★Asobi.

data.title: Ikkitousen: Extravaganza Epoch
data.title_japanese: 一騎当千 Extravaganza Epoch
data.synopsis:
Sonsaku Hakufu along with Shokatsuryou Koumei, Chouhi Ekitoku, and Ryuubi Gentoku are investigating Magatama-related incidents that occurred in the last week. Apparently warriors coming from the west are involved, and the defeated all bore the markings of a sword brim on their bodies. Kan'u Unchou, a special A-rank, set out to investigate the enemies, but supposedly loses to them. Ekitoku suspects Kansai has people that are S-ranks, since this is the only way such a defeat could be explained. They then all plan to meet up with Chouun Shiryuu and Kan at a nearby temple, to ensure that there are no more victims, but things are starting to look very grim...

(Source: foo2)

titles.title: Ai Tenshi Densetsu Wedding Peach Specials
愛天使伝説 ウェディングピーチ

data.title: Ai Tenshi Densetsu Wedding Peach Specials
data.title_japanese: 愛天使伝説 ウェディングピーチ
data.synopsis:
Specials of Wedding Peach included as a bonus on LD/DVD Box set volumes.

Omake 1: Gomenne Yousuke no Maki. (Episode 10,526)

A preview of "Episode 10,527" appears at the end, however, this is just a teaser—it doesn't actually exist.

Omake 2: Ai Tenshi Sentai Saigo no Tatakai. (Final Episode)

The "Wedding Baseball Tournament" preview of which is shown at the end of the final episode was also never released.

titles.title: おめでとうイエスさま

data.title: Omedetou Jesus-sama
data.title_japanese: おめでとうイエスさま
data.synopsis: Tells the story of Jesus' birth in the manger that starts out with an angel coming to tell Mary that she's pregnant.

data.title: Doolie Baenang-Yeohaeng
data.title_japanese: 둘리의 배낭여행
data.synopsis:
Dooly and gang travel around the world, speaking English and making new friends. This educational video was made to capture the popular English learning boom that happened around its creation time.

(Source: Cake-kun and AniDB)

data.title: Examurai Sengoku Recap
data.title_japanese: エグザムライ戦国
data.synopsis: A recap episode that starts out with the main character reminiscing of the story thus far over various card and board games.
